live_updates: Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area. Further updates will continue in the morning.

BC Hydro is working on restoring power across the South Coast.  As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area.  
 For a list of ongoing power outages, please visit https://www.bchydro.com/power-outages/app/outage-list.html
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45733.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mainland and on Vancouver Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to multiple Hydro outages and extreme weather. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45733.title: Jan 7 – Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

45755.summary: Some customers may experience an interruption of the affected Shaw services between 3:00 and 8:00 am ET. This interruption is expected to last approximately five (5) hours. Services will be restored automatically when the maintenance is complete.
45755.title: Jan 10 - Thunder Bay | Internet Interruption

45756.summary: Some customers may experience an interruption of the affected Shaw services between 3:00 and 8:00 am ET. This interruption is expected to last approximately five (5) hours. Services will be restored automatically when the maintenance is complete.
45756.title: Jan 10 - Wawa | Internet Interruption

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.

45772.summary: Some customers in the Ranchlands area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
